GSD.description:
scsi: sg: Allow waiting for commands to complete on removed device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.326 by commit bbc118acf7baf9e93c5e1314d14f481301af4d0f. For more details please see the references link.
